description.para: BE_FUNCTION(NAME, TYPE, ARGSLIST, SYMBOLNAMES, CAPABILITY, [(MODELS)], [REF]) is the macro used for constructing pointers to library functions and wrapping function pointers in backend functors.

The sixth argument (MODELS) is optional, and contains a list of models that you want this function to be able to be used with. The seventh argument REF is optional, and contains a string of citation keys as references for the backend function

memberdef.name: BE_FUNCTION_5
memberdef.initializer: BE_FUNCTION_I(NAME, TYPE, ARGSLIST, SYMBOLNAMES, CAPABILITY, (), "")

memberdef.name: BE_FUNCTION_6
memberdef.initializer: BE_FUNCTION_I(NAME, TYPE, ARGSLIST, SYMBOLNAMES, CAPABILITY, MODELS, "")

memberdef.name: BE_FUNCTION_7
memberdef.initializer: BE_FUNCTION_I(NAME, TYPE, ARGSLIST, SYMBOLNAMES, CAPABILITY, MODELS, REF)

memberdef.name: BE_FUNCTION
memberdef.initializer: VARARG(BE_FUNCTION, __VA_ARGS__)

memberdef.name: BE_FUNCTION_I
memberdef.initializer: BE_FUNCTION_I_AUX(NAME, TYPE, ARGLIST, SYMBOLNAMES, CAPABILITY, MODELS) \ BE_FUNCTION_I_MAIN(NAME, TYPE, ARGLIST, SYMBOLNAMES, CAPABILITY, MODELS, REF) \ BE_FUNCTION_I_SUPP(NAME)

memberdef.name: BE_FUNCTION_I_AUX
memberdef.initializer: IF_ELSEIF(USING_MATHEMATICA, BE_FUNCTION_I_MATH, \ USING_PYTHON, BE_FUNCTION_I_PY, \ BE_FUNCTION_I_OTHER)(NAME, TYPE, ARGLIST, SYMBOLNAMES, CAPABILITY, MODELS)

memberdef.name: BE_FUNCTION_I_OTHER
memberdef.initializer: namespace Gambit \ { \ namespace Backends \ { \ namespace CAT_3(BACKENDNAME,_,SAFE_VERSION) \ { \ /* Define a type NAME_type to be a suitable function pointer. */ \ typedef TYPE (*NAME##_type) CONVERT_VARIADIC_ARG(ARGLIST); \ \ extern const NAME##_type NAME = load_backend_symbol<NAME##_type>(initVector<str>( \ STRIP_PARENS(SYMBOLNAMES)), STRINGIFY(BACKENDNAME), STRINGIFY(VERSION)); \ \ } \ } \ }

briefdescription.para: Backend function macro for other backends (C/C++/Fortran)
Main actual backend function macro.

memberdef.name: BE_FUNCTION_I_SUPP

briefdescription.para: Supplemenentary backend function macro.

memberdef.name: BE_CONV_FUNCTION_FULL
memberdef.initializer: BE_CONV_FUNCTION_MAIN(NAME, TYPE, ARGSLIST, CAPABILITY, MODELS, REF) \ BE_CONV_FUNCTION_SUPP(NAME)

sectiondef.header: Main wrapping macro for convenience functions

description.para: BE_CONV_FUNCTION(NAME, TYPE, ARGSLIST, CAPABILITY, [(MODELS)], [REF]) is the macro used for wrapping convenience functions in backend functors.

sectiondef.header: Supplementary wrapping macro for convenience functions

memberdef.name: BE_CONV_FUNCTION_SUPP
ARG_NAME
memberdef.initializer: (ELEM arg##INDEX)

briefdescription.para: Macros to add names to an argument list.

memberdef.name: FUNCTION_ARGS_SEQ
memberdef.initializer: BOOST_PP_IF(ISEMPTY(ARGLIST), (), \ BOOST_PP_SEQ_FOR_EACH_I(ARG_NAME, , BOOST_PP_TUPLE_TO_SEQ(ARGLIST)))

memberdef.name: FUNCTION_ARGS
memberdef.initializer: BOOST_PP_SEQ_TO_TUPLE(FUNCTION_ARGS_SEQ(ARGLIST))

memberdef.name: ARG_NAME_ONLY
memberdef.initializer: (std::forward<ELEM>(arg##INDEX))

briefdescription.para: Macros to get only the names corresponding to an argument list.

memberdef.name: FUNCTION_ARG_NAMES_SEQ
memberdef.initializer: BOOST_PP_IF(ISEMPTY(ARGLIST), (), \ BOOST_PP_SEQ_FOR_EACH_I(ARG_NAME_ONLY, , BOOST_PP_TUPLE_TO_SEQ(ARGLIST)))

memberdef.name: FUNCTION_ARG_NAMES
memberdef.initializer: BOOST_PP_SEQ_TO_TUPLE(FUNCTION_ARG_NAMES_SEQ(ARGLIST))

memberdef.name: MODULE
memberdef.initializer: BackendIniBit

briefdescription.para: Declare the backend initialisation module BackendIniBit.

memberdef.name: BE_INI_DEPENDENCY
memberdef.initializer: CORE_DEPENDENCY(DEP, TYPE, BackendIniBit, CAT_5(BACKENDNAME,_,SAFE_VERSION,_,init), NOT_MODEL)

briefdescription.para: Dependency macro for point-level backend initialisation functions (in BackendIniBit)

memberdef.name: BE_INI_CONDITIONAL_DEPENDENCY
memberdef.initializer: CORE_START_CONDITIONAL_DEPENDENCY(BackendIniBit, CAT_5(BACKENDNAME,_,SAFE_VERSION,_,init), CAT_5(BACKENDNAME,_,SAFE_VERSION,_,init), DEP, TYPE, NOT_MODEL) \ ACTIVATE_DEP_MODEL(BackendIniBit, CAT_5(BACKENDNAME,_,SAFE_VERSION,_,init), CAT_5(BACKENDNAME,_,SAFE_VERSION,_,init), DEP, NOT_MODEL, #__VA_ARGS__)

briefdescription.para: Model-conditional dependency macro for point-level backend initialisation functions (in BackendIniBit)

memberdef.name: BE_ALLOW_MODEL
memberdef.initializer: BE_NAMESPACE \ { \ namespace \ { \ const int UNUSED_OK CAT(MODEL,_OK) = \ vectorstr_push_back(allowed_models,STRINGIFY(MODEL)); \ } \ } \ END_BE_NAMESPACE \ CORE_ALLOWED_MODEL(BackendIniBit,CAT_4(BACKENDNAME,_,SAFE_VERSION,_init), \ MODEL, NOT_MODEL) \

briefdescription.para: Macro for assigning a single allowed model to an entire backend.

memberdef.name: SET_ALLOWED_MODELS
memberdef.initializer: int CAT(allowed_models_set_,NAME) = \ set_allowed_models(Functown::NAME, allowed_models, STRINGIFY(MODELS));

briefdescription.para: Set all the allowed models for a given backend functor.

memberdef.name: MAKE_INUSE_POINTER
memberdef.initializer: namespace BackendIniBit \ { \ namespace Pipes \ { \ namespace CAT_4(BACKENDNAME,_,SAFE_VERSION,_init) \ { \ namespace InUse \ { \ safe_ptr<bool> NAME = Backends::CAT_3(BACKENDNAME,_,SAFE_VERSION) \ ::Functown::NAME.inUsePtr(); \ } \ } \ } \ } \

briefdescription.para: Make the inUse pipe for a given backend functor.
Macro containing initialization code.

memberdef.name: REGISTER_BACKEND
memberdef.initializer: int CAT_4(BE,_,SAFEVER,_rego) = \ register_backend(STRINGIFY(BE), STRINGIFY(VER), SAFE_STRINGIFY(REF));

briefdescription.para: Register this backend with the Core if not running in standalone mode.

memberdef.name: LOAD_ALL_FACTORIES
memberdef.initializer: BOOST_PP_SEQ_FOR_EACH(LOAD_FACTORIES_FOR_TYPE, , CAT_4(BACKENDNAME,_,SAFE_VERSION,_all_data))

briefdescription.para: Load factory functions for classes provided by this backend.
Load all factory functions for a given type.

memberdef.name: LOAD_NTH_FACTORY_FOR_TYPE
memberdef.initializer: LOAD_SINGLE_FACTORY(data, CAT_3(data,factory,i), BOOST_PP_TUPLE_ELEM(2,1,elem), \ BOOST_PP_TUPLE_ELEM(2,0,elem), CAT(data,abstract), CAT(data,wrapper)::CAT(__factory,i) ) \

briefdescription.para: Redirector from within BOOST_PP_SEQ_FOR_EACH_I to LOAD_SINGLE_FACTORY.
Load a single factory function from a backend.

memberdef.name: BE_VARIABLE_I
memberdef.initializer: BE_VARIABLE_I_AUX(NAME, TYPE, SYMBOLNAMES, CAPABILITY, MODELS) \ BE_VARIABLE_I_MAIN(NAME, MATH_TYPE(TYPE), SYMBOLNAMES, CAPABILITY, \ MODELS, REF) \ BE_VARIABLE_I_SUPP(NAME)

memberdef.name: BE_VARIABLE_I_AUX
memberdef.initializer: IF_ELSEIF(USING_MATHEMATICA, BE_VARIABLE_I_MATH, \ USING_PYTHON, BE_VARIABLE_I_PY, \ BE_VARIABLE_I_OTHER)(NAME, TYPE, SYMBOLNAMES, CAPABILITY, MODELS)

memberdef.name: BE_VARIABLE_I_OTHER
memberdef.initializer: namespace Gambit \ { \ namespace Backends \ { \ namespace CAT_3(BACKENDNAME,_,SAFE_VERSION) \ { \ \ /* Set the variable pointer and the getptr function. */ \ extern TYPE* const NAME = \ load_backend_symbol<TYPE*>(initVector<str>(STRIP_PARENS(SYMBOLNAMES)), \ STRINGIFY(BACKENDNAME), STRINGIFY(VERSION)); \ TYPE* CAT(getptr,NAME)() { return NAME; } \ \ } \ } \ }

briefdescription.para: Backend variable macro for regular backends (C/C++/Fortran)
Main actual backend variable macro.

memberdef.name: BE_VARIABLE_I_SUPP

briefdescription.para: Supplementary backend variable macro.

detaileddescription.para: General macros for loading a shared library and constructing pointers to the variables and functions within the library.
Authors (add name and date if you modify):
